doc:
Marcel Bozzuffi https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marcel_Bozzuffi 0 Marcel Bozzuffi (28 October 1928 – 1 February 1988) was a French film actor, perhaps best remembered for his role as a brutal hitman in the Oscar-winning American film The French Connection. In 1963, he married French actress Françoise Fabian. Marcel_Bozzuffi ( 28_October_1928 – 1_February_1988 ) was a_French_film_actor , perhaps_best_remembered for his_role as a_brutal_hitman in the_Oscar-winning_American_film The_French_Connection . In 1963 , he married French_actress_Françoise_Fabian .
